text: kya aapane use dekha, jisane bana liya apana poojy apanee ichchha ko tatha kupath kar diya allaah ne use jaanate hue aur muhar laga dee usake kaan tatha dil par aur bana diya usakee aankh par aavaran (parda)? phir kaun hai, jo seedhee raah dikhaayega use allaah ke pashchaat? to kya tum shiksha grahan nahin karate
